cyclone.name: ELSA
cyclone.trajectory: moving WNW through the eastern Caribbean, forecast to skirt southern Hispaniola Saturday, Jamaica/eastern Cuba Sunday, and eventually approach the eastern Gulf of Mexico early next week

weather_observation.watch_coast: Hurricane and tropical-storm watches are confined to the Windward Islands, southern Hispaniola, and parts of the Caribbean—well south of New Jersey
weather_observation.warning_coast: Hurricane warnings: Barbados, St. Lucia, St. Vincent and the Grenadines. Tropical-storm warnings: Martinique, southern Dominican Republic coast, entire Haiti coast
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Windward Islands, southern Leeward Islands, southern Hispaniola, Jamaica, eastern Cuba, eventually Florida Gulf Coast
weather_observation.wind: Only a very small (≤3%) chance of tropical-storm-force gusts toward the middle of next week; otherwise normal summer breezes
